attributes.additional_details: The Government need to do this to save jobs in the Manufacturing and Dealerships that are struggling to meet these targets
attributes.background: The Government need to postpone these Mandates until the consumers are ready

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Abolish the deadline for the purchase of new petrol and diesel cars
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704957
